charinfo.name: Shee (S)
charinfo.description: Shee (S) is a jounin of the Hidden Cloud Village and a sensor. Shee is one of the Raikage's most reliable shinobi.

abilities.name: Sensor Awareness
abilities.description: Shee (S) uses Sensor Awareness and deals 20 damage to 1 random enemy. For 1 turn if a new enemy skill is used on Shee he will be invulnerable for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Ally Heal
abilities.description: Using Ally Heal Shee (S) heals 1 ally for 25 health.

abilities.name: Lightning Illusion Flash
abilities.description: Shee (S) uses Lightning Illusion Flash on 1 enemy dealing 35 damage. That enemy will be invulnerable to new friendly skills for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Defensive Reaction
abilities.description: This skill makes Shee (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
